title: Processes - Particular Solution to Diff Eq

content.question: If <math alttext="the derivative of x with respect to t, equals 4 times t cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math> and if <math alttext="x equals 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> when <math alttext="t equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>, what is the value of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> when <math alttext="t equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></math> ?

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
